Title: Scrum Factory 2012
Description:
This is the newest and improved version of The Scrum Factory.
Scrum Factory is a client-server application that helps teams to conduct software development projects using Scrum methodology.
HomeWiki:
This is the newest and improved version of The Scrum Factory.
Scrum Factory is a client-server application that helps teams to conduct software development projects using Scrum methodology.


It has a very reach client interface and currently has the following key features:

  • Authentication with Google login or Windows authentication
  • Project portfolio
  • Backlog management
  • Team allocation
  • Task assignment
  • Risk management
  • Project Monitoring using burndown charts, budget, quality, deadline and velocity indicators
  • Project proposal management

Check www.scrum-factory.com for more details.
